title: Christian Robertson
content:
Christian Robertson designed [Pill Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823074531/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Pill%20Gothic) and [Dear Sarah](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823074531/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Dear%20Sarah), both available through [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823074531/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Veer), as well as the [Roboto](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823074531/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Roboto) typeface family, used in the Android mobile operating system. More of Christian’s type designs can be seen at [Betatype](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823074531/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Betatype) ( [www.betatype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823074531/http:/www.betatype.com/)).

Christian joined [Punchcut](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823074531/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Punchcut) as Senior Media Designer in December 2004. He is the mastermind behind the development of the new [Typophile](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823074531/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typophile) platform.
author: Jared Benson
